title: the my shop magic!!!
body:
im pretty sure its obvious who i main and my favorite skin is stinger akali right? so i go into my shop and open the sales at random one by one,  nope no stinger akali here, not here, not here either and on the very last one i pretty much lost hope at that point and BAM stinger akali at 416 rp insta buy 
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
